articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: Indian voters battle extreme temperatures as intense heat wave hits region - CNN
articles.description: Indian voters are battling sweltering conditions to take part in the world’s biggest election as a severe heat wave hits parts of the country and authorities forecast a hotter-than-normal summer for the South Asian nation.
